atk-s0401a8:1: 71. Aṭṭhamassa paṭhame kalyāṇamittatāti kalyāṇā mittā assāti kalyāṇamitto, tassa bhāvo kalyāṇamittatā. Sesaṁ vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0401a8:2_0: 72-73. Dutiye anuyogoti yogo payogo. Ananuyogoti ayogo appayogo. Anuyogāti anuyogena.
atk-s0401a8:2_1: Ananuyogāti ananuyogena. Kusalānaṁ dhammānanti catubhūmakakusaladhammānaṁ. Tatiyaṁ uttānatthameva.
atk-s0401a8:3_0: 74. Catutthe bojjhaṅgāti bujjhanakasattassa aṅgabhūtā satta dhammā. Yāya vā dhammasāmaggiyā
atk-s0401a8:3_1: so bujjhati, sammohaniddāto vā vuṭṭhāti, catusaccadhammaṁ vā sacchikaroti. Tassā
atk-s0401a8:3_2: bodhiyā aṅgabhūtātipi bojjhaṅgā. “Bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā? Bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā,
atk-s0401a8:3_3: anubujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, paṭibujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, sambujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā, bodhāya
atk-s0401a8:3_4: saṁvattantīti bojjhaṅgā”ti. Evaṁ panetaṁ padaṁ vibhattameva.
atk-s0401a8:4_0: 75. Pañcame bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchantīti iminā padena bojjhaṅgānaṁ yāthāvasarasabhūmi
atk-s0401a8:4_1: nāma kathitā. Sā panesā catubbidhā hoti – vipassanā, vipassanāpādakajjhānaṁ, maggo,
atk-s0401a8:4_2: phalanti. Tattha vipassanāya uppajjanakāle bojjhaṅgā kāmāvacarā honti, vipassanāpādakajjhānamhi
atk-s0401a8:4_3: uppajjanakāle rūpāvacaraarūpāvacarā, maggaphalesu uppajjanakāle lokuttarā. Iti imasmiṁ
atk-s0401a8:5_0: 76. Chaṭṭhassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo. Aṭṭhuppattiyaṁ hetaṁ nikkhittaṁ, sambahulā
atk-s0401a8:5_1: kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṁ sannisinnā. Tesaṁ antare bandhulamallasenāpatiṁ ārabbha
atk-s0401a8:5_2: ayaṁ kathā udapādi, “āvuso, asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe bahuñātikaṁ ahosi bahupakkhaṁ,
atk-s0401a8:5_3: idāni appañātikaṁ appapakkhaṁ jāta”nti. Atha bhagavā tesaṁ cittācāraṁ ñatvā “mayi
atk-s0401a8:5_4: gate mahatī desanā bhavissatī”ti ñatvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma dhammasabhāyaṁ paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0401a8:5_5: nisīditvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti āha. Bhagavā aññā
atk-s0401a8:5_6: gāmanigamādikathā natthi, asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe bahuñātikaṁ ahosi bahupakkhaṁ,
atk-s0401a8:5_7: idāni appañātikaṁ appapakkhaṁ jātanti vadantā nisinnamhāti. Satthā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā
atk-s0401a8:5_8: appamattikā esā, bhikkhave, parihānīti idaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a8:6_0: Tattha appamattikāti parittā parittappamāṇā. Etāya hi parihāniyā saggato vā maggato
atk-s0401a8:6_1: vā parihāni nāma natthi, diṭṭhadhammikaparihānimattameva etanti āha. Etaṁ patikiṭṭhanti
atk-s0401a8:6_2: etaṁ pacchimaṁ etaṁ lāmakaṁ. Yadidaṁ paññāparihānīti yā esā mama sāsane kammassakatapaññāya
atk-s0401a8:6_3: jhānapaññāya vipassanāpaññāya maggapaññāya phalapaññāya ca parihāni, esā pacchimā,
atk-s0401a8:7_0: 77. Sattamampi aṭṭhuppattiyameva kathitaṁ. Dhammasabhāyaṁ kira nisinnesu bhikkhūsu
atk-s0401a8:7_1: ekacce evaṁ āhaṁsu – “asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe appañātikaṁ appapakkhaṁ ahosi, idāni
atk-s0401a8:7_2: taṁ bahuñātikaṁ bahupakkhaṁ jāta”nti. Kaṁ sandhāya evamāhaṁsūti? Visākhaṁ upāsikaṁ
atk-s0401a8:7_3: vesālike ca licchavī. Satthā tesaṁ cittācāraṁ ñatvā purimanayeneva āgantvā dhammāsane
atk-s0401a8:7_4: nisinno “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchi. Te yathābhūtaṁ
atk-s0401a8:7_5: kathayiṁsu. Satthā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā imaṁ suttaṁ ārabhi. Tattha appamattikāti
atk-s0401a8:7_6: taṁ sampattiṁ nissāya saggaṁ vā maggaṁ vā sampattānaṁ abhāvato parittā. Yadidaṁ paññāvuddhīti
atk-s0401a8:7_7: kammassakatapaññādīnaṁ vuddhi. Tasmāti yasmā ñātīnaṁ vuddhi nāma diṭṭhadhammikamattā
atk-s0401a8:7_8: appā parittā, sā saggaṁ vā maggaṁ vā pāpetuṁ asamatthā, tasmā. Paññāvuddhiyāti kammassakatādipaññāya vuddhiyā.
atk-s0401a8:8_0: 78. Aṭṭhamampi aṭṭhuppattiyameva kathitaṁ. Sambahulā kira bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṁ
atk-s0401a8:8_1: sannisinnā mahādhanaseṭṭhiputtaṁ ārabbha “asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe mahābhogaṁ mahāhiraññasuvaṇṇaṁ
atk-s0401a8:8_2: ahosi, taṁ idāni appabhogaṁ jāta”nti kathayiṁsu. Satthā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṁ
atk-s0401a8:9_0: 79. Navamampi aṭṭhuppattiyameva vuttaṁ. Dhammasabhāyaṁ kira sannisinnā bhikkhū kākavaliyaseṭṭhiñca
atk-s0401a8:9_1: puṇṇaseṭṭhiñca ārabbha “asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe appabhogaṁ ahosi, taṁ idāni mahābhogaṁ
atk-s0401a8:9_2: jāta”nti kathayiṁsu. Satthā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā imaṁ suttaṁ
atk-s0401a8:9_3: ārabhi. Sesaṁ imesu dvīsupi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0401a8:10_0: 80. Dasamampi aṭṭhuppattiyaṁ vuttaṁ. Dhammasabhāyaṁ kira bhikkhū kosalamahārājānaṁ
atk-s0401a8:10_1: ārabbha “asukaṁ nāma kulaṁ pubbe mahāyasaṁ mahāparivāraṁ ahosi, idāni appayasaṁ appaparivāraṁ
atk-s0401a8:10_2: jāta”nti kathayiṁsu. Bhagavā purimanayeneva āgantvā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ
